current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To improve wait times for appointments for hospital care, medical services, and other health care
			 from the Department of Veterans Affairs, to improve accountability of
			 employees responsible for long wait times for such appointments, and for
			 other purposes.
